context: Good morning! I'm in the mood to see a movie. Any suggestions?
I do like comedy movies as well as others. We really enjoyed Daddy's Home (2015) .
Of course, you have to see The Dark Knight (2008)
Yes, that is a good movie. We really love Will Ferrill here.
resp: In comedy, Juno (2007) is a very good movie, with a profond message

context.content: Hello
Hi! What kind of movies do you like?

I enjoy discovering hidden gems and underrated movies that cover inspiring and informative biography, emotional and thought-provoking drama, and informative and enlightening history. Do you have any recommendations for me?

It's always exciting to stumble upon lesser-known films that cover inspiring and informative biography, emotional and thought-provoking drama, and informative and enlightening history. I can't wait to see what recommendations the recommender has for me!

context.content: I would recommend Hidden Figures (2016). It's a great movie.
Can you tell me more about Hidden Figures? I'd love to know about the inspiring biography, emotional drama, and enlightening history it covers.
context.feelings: I'm excited to learn more about Hidden Figures. It sounds like it could be a hidden gem that covers inspiring biography and enlightening history. I wonder if it also has the emotional and thought-provoking drama I enjoy. I'll ask for more details about the movie.
